data.title: Valet Tray Bundle
data.desc: The perfect place to store your everyday carry items. The non-slip rubber feet hold the valet tray in place and allow them to be stacked with additional trays.

data.title: Mist (Black Triblend)
data.desc: Each refillable discbound journal is made from the highest quality components – from the solid metal discs, to the full-grain leather, to the perfect paper stock. The discbound system is made of 8 modular discs that allow paper to be freely added

data.title: Hasami Porcelain Mug
data.desc: Hasami Porcelain is crafted using methods that are over 400 years old. Unlike mass-produced porcelain, each piece derives unique character from the manual work to mold, glaze, and fire it.
